edge_1: The film did receive some subsidies from the regional governments whose territories were showcased in the picture.
edge_2: The film was an international co-production between the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany and Luxembourg.
edge_3: Both Luxembourg and Belgium were locations for the film's shooting.

edge_1: The streets of 17th century Paris were recreated in Sarlat-la-Canéda for the film.
edge_2: The streets of 17th century Paris recreated in Sarlat-la-Canéda served as a replacement for the now demolished fortifications of The Cité de Carcassonne.
edge_3: The streets of 17th century Paris were recreated in Sarlat-la-Canéda for the film.
